name: Magic Arrow
description:
This game was made for Trijam #201 with the theme "You got 1 Shot". I spent a little over three hours because I got carried away, but I wanted to post anyway because I liked the theme and the final result.

In this game you are Ikarus, and your only weapon to face the dangers of the labyrinth is a bow and a single arrow, luckily this is the legendary and powerful Magic Arrow.

CONTROL

KEY:

  • MOVE: Arrow Keys
  • SHOT: X

MOBILE:

  • Buttons in Screen

Game by Róger Goulart (@roger_goulart)
